status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"989sn","text":"Prepare buffers and filter sterilize, add RNAse inhibitor fresh NP40 Lysis Buffer (NST): 0.1% NP-40 Alternative (or NP-40),   Tris,   NaCl,  CaCl2, 21mM MgCl2, 40U/mL of Protector RNAse inhibitor (add fresh day of) ST Wash Buffer: (10mM Tris,   NaCl,   CaCl2, 21mM MgCl2), 0.01% BSA, 40U/mL of Protector RNAse inhibitor (add fresh day of) ST Staining buffer (ST-SB): 2%BSA, 0.02%Tween-20,   Tris,  NaCl, 1mM CaCl2, 21mM MgCl2), 40U/mL of Protector RNAse inhibitor (add fresh day of) Note: Keep tissues/homogenate and buffers on ice throughout the protocol. Pre-cool the centrifuge to  and keep at   for all steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":124,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":132,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":140,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":243,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":251,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":389,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":397,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":584,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":597,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rsto","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"146","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"146","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":13}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"10","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"6":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"146","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"7":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"8":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":""," {"blocks":[{"key":"8mjr5","text":"Tissue collection a) Sacrifice and rapidly decapitate mice. Using chilled brain matrix (Ted Pella), cut a thick coronal section from 5mm back from start of cortex until start of cerebellum. Store section in ice-cold Hibernate-A media in 10cm plate on ice until all brains have been dissected. b) Use a razor blade to dissect out midbrain and collect tissue, placing directly into dounce homogenizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fbrqk","text":"Tissue lysis and homogenizing a) For each sample to barcode and pool: prepare a separate homogenizer and douncing pestles (loose and tight). Add   NST buffer to the tube with tissue and transfer to dounce homogenizer and keep on ice. b) with a total volume of  , dounce 20 times with the loose pestle followed by 20 times with the tight pestle. c) Add   of ST wash buffer, filter through 30µm filters (Milentyi Biotec 130-041-407) and transfer filtered homogenate to a 15mL tube. d) Rinse the homogenizer with 3x  of ST wash buffer, filter through 30µm filters and add to the filtered homogenate to add up to a final volume of  . e) Immediately spin down at   for   at   to pellet the nuclei in swing bucket rotor f) Remove supernatant g) Resuspend nuclei in 200µl of ST-SB and transfer to lo-bind  tube and wash out the original tube with an additional   and transfer to the same 1.5ml tube. h) Wash by spinning down for   at   at  and resuspending in   ST-SB twice, for a total of 3 washes i) resuspend in   ST-SB","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":145,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":260,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":352,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":513,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":627,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":658,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":664,"length":1},{"key":7,"offset":669,"length":1},{"key":8,"offset":798,"length":1},{"key":9,"offset":854,"length":1},{"key":10,"offset":922,"length":1},{"key":11,"offset":927,"length":1},{"key":12,"offset":932,"length":1},{"key":13,"offset":953,"length":1},{"key":14,"offset":1008,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bt4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"10":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"11":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"12":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"13":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"14":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0
